title: What causes Obesity
summary: This chart displays causes of Obesity .
The highest percentage of Obesity cases would be because of Fast_Food at 60 percentage , followed by Genetic reasons at 30 percentage and then Lack_of_Exercises of exercise at 10 percentage .
gold: Fast food causes 60 % of obesity , genetic predisposition some 30 % whilst lack of exercise contributes the other 10 %
